Register!

Ready to sign up? The link below will take you to the online registration form. Stuck on something? Don't hesitate to ask for help: blast@usadance-mn.org.

Register Online

Confused?

If we lose you anywhere, our friendly guide for newcomers may be useful.

What can I enter? What's it cost?

For amateur couples, we offer 4 levels: Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Open. For mixed proficiency couples, there is only 1 level. In all amateur levels and MP, we offer these single-dance events:

Smooth Standard
  • Waltz
  • Tango
  • Foxtrot
  • Viennese Waltz
  • Waltz
  • Tango
  • Viennese Waltz
  • Foxtrot
  • Quickstep
Rhythm Latin
  • Cha Cha
  • Rumba
  • Swing
  • Bolero
  • Mambo
  • Samba
  • Cha Cha
  • Rumba
  • Paso Doble
  • Jive

Pricing

The short version: $40 per person for up to eight entries or $8 per person for each entry.

The registration form will calculate a price for you, but here's the gist:

  • Each event entry is $8 per person.
  • Your first mixed proficiency event is free; additional MP entries are $8 each.
  • MP events are always free for the more proficient partner.
  • Entry to the ballroom for each session is $5 (there are 2 sessions).
  • Competitor package: up to 8 amateur event entries for $40 per person. Includes entry to both sessions.

Limits

When registering, the form will disable some options and tell you why. Here's how it will limit you:

  • Each person may enter up to 8 amateur events.
  • You may only dance 1 mixed proficiency event with a given partner.
  • You may not dance mixed proficiency and amateur with the same partner.

Travel Advice

Destination

Coffman Memorial Union
300 Washington Ave SE
Minneapolis MN 55455
(In the Great Hall) (Map)

Parking

You can park anywhere on campus, though we recommend parking at the East River Road Garage (directions, cost). From this garage, use the elevators to go to level A and head into Coffman Memorial Union to find the Great Hall.

Just a reminder:

Schedule (this may change a bit)

Day Session

9 AM: Doors Open
10 AM: Rhythm and Latin
12:30 AM: Fun Dances, Jack and Jill, Games!
1 PM: Lunch Break
2 PM: Smooth and Standard
4:30 PM: Fun Dances, Jack and Jill, Games!
5:00 PM: Dinner Break

Evening Session

6:30 PM: Evening Show, Performances, General Dancing, Games!
10:00 PM: End of Event. See you at Star of the North on March 1st and 2nd, 2014!

Minnesota Ballroom Blast is

low-stress, feedback-based, and designed to:

  • Provide social dancers and competitors alike with meaningful feedback from professionals they might not otherwise have access to
  • Introduce beginners to the general format of a competition in a low-chaos environment
  • Provide a preparatory event for those looking to compete
  • Allow couples to experiment with new choreography and costuming

Questions? Contact Us.

If you have any questions or need any assistance, please e-mail us at blast@usadance-mn.org.
